entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:17 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:17 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
